## Vector3.(constructor)

Creates a new Vector3 initialized with values in a Float32Array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(array: Float32Array);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | Float32Array | Float32Array object that contains the x, y, z values. |
